response.overview: Going to the end with you is my greatest wish. The carefree late summer (played by Xu Ruohan) and the gentle and restrained early autumn (played by Zhang Kaitai) have witnessed each other's beautiful green years and spent many unforgettable moments with each other. They have the tacit understanding of childhood sweethearts and the courage to resist reality. His love is vigorous, and her love is unwavering. Perhaps the road to true love is not smooth. Misunderstandings and misses once brought two lovers to the edge of separation. But how can the right person get separated?
response.title: If We Were Lucky
